Fuqing Huang

Ph.D.
Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University
fuz@fafu.edu.cn


Biography

I am a master’s student at Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou, China. My research lies at the intersection of computer science and medical information – with a special focus on fatigue detection based on physiological signals. My research interests include domain adaptation learning, time series classification, multimodal fusion, and Transformer.

Education

  • M.S., 2022 - now, School of Computer and Information Science,
    Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou, China

  • B.S., 2018 - 2022, School of Computer Information Engineering,
    Jiangxi Normal University, NanChang, China
